name: Vidya Vardhini Foundation Trust
briefDescription: Our Foundation works in the field of Community Empowerment with a special focus on children and young adults with disability. Our area of work is Cheeta Camp and Trombay slums. We also run a VISION  CENTRE in collaboration with Haji Bachooali Eye Hospital Parel which has a clinic working every Monday at our office in Trombay. We also have an Integrated  Pre - School with 30 children in Trombay.
